Oh Gosh Javascript

February 27, 2014 Javascript, Tips, Programming

Javascript is a funny language. I rarely find myself going "oh that makes sense" , but then again when I think about all the rules and structures of the language, it does make sense in that context ... Of course, I'm not justifying the language decisions, just that based on the design of the language, the outcomes make sense. Continue reading →
